mapper.update: update order set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, serviceid = #{serviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_address = #{orderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_content = #{orderContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_payment = #{orderPayment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_evaluation = #{orderEvaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_contract = #{orderContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storesid = #{storesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commissionid = #{commissionid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_id, userid, serviceid, order_time, order_address, order_content, order_payment, order_status, order_evaluation, order_contract, storesid, commissionid from order where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select order_id, userid, serviceid, order_time, order_address, order_content, order_payment, order_status, order_evaluation, order_contract, storesid, commissionid from order
